title: Cultist Brawler
description: The Cultist Brawler is the muscle of the roaming congregations—masked, crowned, and eager for close bloodshed. He fights with bladed gauntlets, tearing at flesh as if each wound were proof of devotion. He is not clever, but he is persistent, and he is rarely alone.
history: Cultist Brawlers are drawn from the hard and hungry: drifters, thugs, deserters, and men who found purpose in the cult’s certainty. They travel with the chanters and handlers, serving as escorts and enforcers wherever the Iron Crown’s influence spreads. Whether as emissaries among other threats or as a sign of something deeper at work, their presence marks a place where fear is being cultivated, not merely endured.
summary: A relentless melee zealot who overwhelms targets at close range with bladed gauntlets and stubborn aggression.

appearance.features: Rough hands and scarred forearms, with a heavy, predatory stance

clothing.head: Skull mask crowned with iron spikes
clothing.body: Bare torso marked by scars and crude inked symbols
clothing.legs: Dark, tattered robes secured by a prominent girdle
clothing.accessories: Leather straps and metal bindings for the gauntlets

title: Cultist Acolyte
description: The Cultist Acolyte keeps to the rear, speaking in steady incantations that fray the mind and invite something unseen to tug at the body. Her chants are not meant to kill quickly—they are meant to unmake composure, to break formation, to leave the faithful’s knives and claws to do the rest.
history: Acolytes are the cult’s voice in the world beyond the Manor—wanderers by choice or necessity, drawn to the same looming certainty that gathers others to twisted idols. They move among the Estate’s many dangers, sometimes alongside local horrors, sometimes apart, but always marked by the Iron Crown. Alone they are seldom decisive; with protectors at their side, their words can turn a skirmish into a slow collapse of resolve.
summary: A backline caster who inflicts psychological pressure and disrupts positioning through dark incantations.

appearance.features: Still posture and careful movements, as if listening for distant instructions

clothing.head: Skull mask crowned with iron spikes
clothing.body: Dark robes patterned with occult symbols
clothing.accessories: Corded sash and small pouches for charms and powders

magic: Incantations that strain the mind and call unseen force to pull and push
